description: On a lazy summer afternoon, the boyz decide to pass the time with a foosball game. But to make it more interesting, they decide that the loser has to bottom for the winner! And 19 year-old blond Jarrin is the loser, but you wouldn't know he lost from the enjoyment he obviously gets from having Chris' 8.5 inch cock rammed up his hungry hole. The action starts out with passionate kissing, of course, which leads to intense cock-sucking action, but 20 year-old, dark-haired Chris settles the bet with a hard fuck scene on his younger friend's ass.
title: CitiBoyz 18: Camp Boyz-Only, Scene #04
